mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO QANDA ( QANDA_NO, QANDA_TITLE, QANDA_CONTENT, QANDA_REGDATE, QANDA_IMAGE1, QANDA_IMAGE2, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_REGDATE, ANSWER_CONDITION, QANDA_OPEN_CONDITION, USER_ID)
VALUES (SEQ_QANDA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qandATitle:VARCHAR}, #{qandAContent:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{qandAImage1:VARCHAR}, #{qandAImage2:VARCHAR}, #{qandAAnswerContent:VARCHAR}, #{qandAAnswerRegDate:DATE}, '0', #{qandAOpenCondition}, #{userId.userId:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QANDA_NO, Q.QANDA_TITLE, Q.QANDA_CONTENT, Q.QANDA_REGDATE, Q.QANDA_IMAGE1, Q.QANDA_IMAGE2, Q.ANSWER_CONTENT, Q.ANSWER_REGDATE, Q.ANSWER_CONDITION, Q.QANDA_OPEN_CONDITION, U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME FROM QANDA Q , USERS U WHERE Q.QANDA_NO = #{QANDA_NO} AND Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT Q.QANDA_NO , Q.QANDA_TITLE , Q.ANSWER_CONDITION , U.USER_ID , U.NICKNAME, Q.QANDA_REGDATE, Q.QANDA_IMAGE1, Q.QANDA_IMAGE2, Q.QANDA_OPEN_CONDITION FROM QANDA Q, USERS U
WHERE Q.USER_ID = #{search.userId} AND Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
AND LOWER(QANDA_NO) LIKE LOWER('%${search.searchKeyword}%')
AND LOWER(QANDA_TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%${search.searchKeyword}%')
WHERE Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
AND LOWER(QANDA_NO) LIKE LOWER('%${search.searchKeyword}%')
AND LOWER(QANDA_TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%${search.searchKeyword}%')
ORDER BY QANDA_NO DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
